title: Network Connection Error
body:
Every single game, the load screen gives me a network warning and closes my game. I can only connect after everyone has loaded in.

This just started happening yesterday, and I have never had this issue before. 

Fix plz.

replies.body: It seems like some setting with your network has changed and become unstable, struggling to load you to the game server.  It's good that it's letting you in sometimes, but it could continue to degrade on you and leave you behind entirely.  You'll want to fix this by going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  That should get you squared away!
